name: d365-modalandmore
description: TypeScript UI utility library for Dynamics 365 CE - Toast notifications, Modal dialogs with tabs, and more

scripts.build: vite build && npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && npx rollup -c rollup.dts.config.js && cp build/ui-lib.min.js release/ && cp build/ui-lib.min.js.map release/ && cp build/ui-lib.types.d.ts release/ui-lib.types.d.ts.js && cp README.md release/README.md.html
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run update-solution && npm run pack-solution
